c74object.name: hoa.plug~
c74object.digest: A partcher that duplicates patcher for hoa processing.
c74object.description:
hoa.plug~
facilitates the modularization of patches for ambisonic processing. The number of inlets and outlets is determined by the number of inlets and outlets objects contained within its subpatch window and the ambisonic order.

metadatalist.metadata: hoa.library by Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: patcher-name
objarg.digest: The name of the patcher to load into.
objarg.description: The name of the patcher to load into (must be in your search paths)

objarg.name: mode
objarg.description: - No-mode for no encoding processing, useful to create diffused soundfields. - Pre-mode for processing on order's signals. - Post-mode for processing on harmonics signals.

method.name: open
method.digest: open tne n instance of the patcher.
method.description: open tne n instance of the patcher (like poly~ object.

method.name: (mouse)
method.digest: dblclick to open the last patcher.
method.description: dblclick to open the last patcher.
